HOW is it 1.02 if no one cracked it? Space hamster magic?
Can be either photoshop, or more likely simply edited file version in the executable. You have not answered the question - where did you get the crack?

1: Uninstall all Visual C++ x64 versions from your PC and keep only x86 versions
2: Install NetFramework 4.0 Client
3: Disable UAC
4: Close (logout) from STEAM when you try to play nosteam games
5: Update your Video card driver and turn on most settings from CPanel of card at 3D Settings 
6: If you have nVidia video card switch to Single Display Peformance Mode from 3D Settings.
7: Move your Game on other partition like D:
8: Run game as administrator.
Don't listen to these haters. I've downloaded almost all of nosTEAM's games and all have worked or needed a minor tweak to work. Thank you radurall for all you do! Keep up the great work!
